name: Madrix® Nebula LED DMX Pixel Controller
metaTitle: Madrix® Nebula LED DMX Pixel Controller | Onco Solutions
metaDescription: Explore the Madrix® Nebula — a powerful LED DMX pixel controller supporting Art-Net and sACN over Ethernet or USB. Ideal for pixel-perfect LED installations.
shortDescription: The MADRIX NEBULA is your gateway to breathtaking LED pixel installations. This advanced SPI decoder connects directly to your LEDs, delivering high-quality signals over Ethernet or USB for seamless, vibrant visuals.
description_points: Upto pixel perfect control of LED lights
Ethernet network or USB data communication
Compatible with wide range of LED digital lights

images.alt: Madrix® Nebula LED DMX Pixel Controller image 1
Madrix® Nebula LED DMX Pixel Controller image 2
Madrix® Nebula LED DMX Pixel Controller image 3

specifications.name: Ethernet
specifications.value: 2 x RJ45, Auto MDI-X, Daisy-Chain Support, 10/100 Mbit/S

specifications.name: Network Protocols
specifications.value: Art-Net (1,2,3,4, incl. ArtSync) Streaming ACN (sACN / ANSI E1.31)

specifications.name: USB
specifications.value: 1 x Port USB 2.0 Type-B, Female Socket
